word: WHEN DR. KELLOGG WAS HERE LAST, HE WAS MUCH INTERESTED IN OUR FOOD STORES, AND THE DOCTOR SUGGESTED THAT WE CONSIDER THE ADVISABILITY OF ESTABLISHING RESTAURANTS IN AN INEXPENSIVE WAY IN CONNECTION WITH THESE STORES. WE HAVE THOUGHT THAT SUCH BEGINNINGS COULD BE MADE WITH AN OUTLAY OF TWO OR THREE HUNDRED DOLLARS IN A PLACE. WHAT WOULD YOU THINK OF THAT PLAN?
